title: Chelsea Girls
brief_description: A series of vignettes, both scripted and candid (with most falling somewhere in between); Each scene is intended to be projected side-by-side with another. Highlights include Nico clipping her bangs, a faux pope taking confessions, a drunken mother berating her son and his mute girlfriend, and a torture party in a man’s bed.

constellations_other.name: Lois Weber and the split-screen
constellations_other.description: Lois Weber was the third filmmaker to use split screens to show simultaneous action, helping establish it as part of cinematic language, particularly its use in thrillers. It's since been taken to extremes by auteurs and videogames.
